db:abstract.db:para: A spinbox control that allows the user to select from a set of preset values.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: SpinBox allows the user to choose an integer value by clicking the up or down indicator buttons, or by pressing up or down on the keyboard. Optionally, SpinBox can be also made editable, so the user can enter a text value in the input field.
By default, SpinBox provides discrete values in the range of [0-99] with a stepSize of 1.

db:section.db:title: Custom Values
db:section.db:para: Even though SpinBox works on integer values, it can be customized to accept arbitrary input values. The following snippet demonstrates how validator, textFromValue and valueFromText can be used to customize the default behavior.
In the same manner, SpinBox can be customized to accept floating point numbers:

db:section.db:title: down group
db:section.db:para: These properties hold the down indicator item and whether it is pressed.

db:section.db:title: editable : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the spinbox is editable. The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: from : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the starting value for the range. The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: stepSize : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the step size. The default value is 1.

db:section.db:title: textFromValue : function
db:section.db:para: This property holds a callback function that is called whenever an integer value needs to be converted to display text.

The callback function signature is string function(value, locale). The function can have one or two arguments, where the first argument is the value to be converted, and the optional second argument is the locale that should be used for the conversion, if applicable.
The default implementation does the conversion using Number.toLocaleString():

db:section.db:title: to : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the end value for the range. The default value is 99.

db:section.db:title: up group
db:section.db:para: These properties hold the up indicator item and whether it is pressed.

db:section.db:title: validator : Validator
db:section.db:para: This property holds the input text validator for editable spinboxes. By default, SpinBox uses IntValidator to accept input of integer numbers.

db:section.db:title: value : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the value in the range from - to. The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: valueFromText : function
db:section.db:para: This property holds a callback function that is called whenever input text needs to be converted to an integer value.

The callback function signature is int function(text, locale). The function can have one or two arguments, where the first argument is the text to be converted, and the optional second argument is the locale that should be used for the conversion, if applicable.
The default implementation does the conversion using Number.fromLocaleString():
db:section.db:programlisting: valueFromText: function(text, locale) { return Number.fromLocaleString(locale, text); }

db:section.db:title: void decrease()
db:section.db:para: Decreases the value by stepSize.

db:section.db:title: void increase()
db:section.db:para: Increases the value by stepSize.
